Another strong theme in the literature concerns recognition of interdependence including the intimate
relationship between humans and the non
, with such ecological interdependence offered as an organising principle for
enduring transformation to sustainability. A key policy implication of this is moving away from valuing
nature only in market and monetary terms to strongly incorporatin
of nature in natural resource accounting
. There has been increasing attention on ways to design climate policy
with its emphasis on the collective
